lst.name: sentence
lst.str: U.S. House majority leader Thomas Foley, a Washington Democrat, yesterday predicted during a visit here that the Gephardt provision will be approved by the House when trade legislation is taken up later this month.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In talks with Japanese Agriculture Minister Mutsuki Kato yesterday, Lyng and Trade representative Clayton Yeutter asked Japan to begin negotiations on its rice policy and end import quotas on beef and citrus.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: We are on the verge of some very harsh mandatory retaliatory laws which would have very serious consequences for other countries, especially Japan," Lyng told reporters.
